name: PicnicHealth
headline: Empowering Patients for Deep Real World Data
description: Healthcare needs good data. At PicnicHealth, we are building deep real-world datasets fueling cutting-edge research while giving patients control of their own medical record data. These complete, clinically-rich datasets produce unique insights — across dozens of diseases — to ultimately get the right treatments into patients’ hands faster. We work directly with patients and leverage state of the art machine learning to transform messy medical records into structured, research-ready datasets. To date we’ve helped tens of thousands of patients securely access their records and proactively contribute to advancing research in diseases that impacts their lives.
tags: industry:machine-learning; industry:health-tech; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:nlp; location:san-francisco-bay-area
generated_description:
**PicnicHealth: Empowering Patients through Real-World Data**

Founded in 2014 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Summer 2014 batch, PicnicHealth is a San Francisco-based healthcare tech company on a mission to empower patients by providing access to their medical records and contributing to groundbreaking medical research. The fundamental idea here is simple yet profound: healthcare needs reliable, real-world data to advance treatment options more effectively.

At the core of PicnicHealth's operations is the goal to transform chaotic and unstructured medical records into structured datasets that are rich in clinical detail. This approach enables researchers to glean unique insights across a range of diseases, fostering the speed and accuracy of treatment. Simply put, they are keen on ensuring that the right treatments are delivered to patients as quickly as possible. 

Using state-of-the-art machine learning techniques, PicnicHealth has helped tens of thousands of patients securely access their health records and take a proactive role in research about conditions that affect their lives. This patient-centric model not only satisfies ethical considerations but also puts control back into the hands of individuals who are all too often left in the dark about the data that concerns them.

Currently, PicnicHealth operates with a focused team of around 100 employees under the guidance of Dalton Caldwell, a prominent figure in startup mentoring. They leverage technology tagged under machine learning, digital health, and NLP, showcasing a robust capability to innovate within the healthcare space. Their product offerings cater to two main audiences: patients, who benefit from personalized health management tools; and life sciences companies, who can utilize these comprehensive datasets for observational research.

One standout feature of PicnicHealth is PicnicAI, their proprietary technology that enhances clinical concept recognition by a factor of three. This kind of precision makes managing healthcare data not just feasible but exceptionally accurate—an essential requirement in today’s data-driven environment.

If you want to learn more about PicnicHealth, their services for patients, or research partners, you can explore their website at [picnichealth.com](https://picnichealth.com).

In summary, PicnicHealth exemplifies how tech can play a pivotal role in reshaping the healthcare landscape by prioritizing patient empowerment and harnessing the power of real-world data to accelerate medical research. They aren't just managing records; they're redefining how we think about, engage with, and benefit from healthcare.
